typically 1-2 sentences ending with period or exclamation

extraction_strategy.container_scoped: Extract from active tab content area only, not from tab headers
extraction_strategy.text_cleanup: Remove tab header text contamination, normalize whitespace

common_issues.text_contamination: Tab headers being included in message extraction
common_issues.missing_breath_rate: Breath Rate tab not being clicked or message not found
common_issues.wrong_sleep_message: Extracting from dashboard instead of Sleep Session details page
